index.about_text: Hello! I'm Daniel Suárez. I was born in Gijón on February 6, 2001. Since childhood, I have loved computers and videogames, which is why I decided to study Software Engineering. I am currently pursuing a Master's degree in Web Engineering at the University of Oviedo.
index.full_name: Full name: Daniel Suárez de la Roza

hobbies.heading: Hobbies
hobbies.intro: My main hobby is videogames. I also like watching series and films, listening to music, and spending time with friends.
hobbies.videogames_image: Image of the videogame The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom
hobbies.series_image: Image of the series One Piece

technologies.heading: Technologies I'm interested in
technologies.intro: Here are some interesting technologies I have worked with or would like to work with.
technologies.graphql_desc: GraphQL is a query language and runtime developed by Facebook that allows clients to request exactly the data they need from an API, no more and no less. Unlike REST, it reduces the overhead of multiple requests and makes communication between client and server more efficient, offering flexibility and better performance in data consumption.
technologies.react_desc: React is a JavaScript library developed by Meta for building user interfaces in a declarative and efficient way. It is based on reusable components and a reactive update system that facilitates the creation of dynamic and scalable web applications.
technologies.tailwind_desc: Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework that allows you to design interfaces quickly using predefined classes directly in HTML. It offers great flexibility and avoids writing extensive custom stylesheets, speeding up development and keeping code cleaner.
technologies.docker_desc: Docker is a platform that allows you to package applications and their dependencies into lightweight, portable containers. These containers ensure that software runs consistently across any environment, facilitating deployment, scalability, and integration into modern development workflows.
